comments.body:
This looks like it could be `noarch`?
```suggestion
  number: 0
  noarch: python
```
(if so remove the `skip: true  # [win]` and it doesn't matter if that fails due to missing dependencies)
It could be, but It so far will not be able to install on windows (due to ansible). If it't doesn't matter if win CI will fail due to dependency then I can change that.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +11,15 @@
build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv"
